data.name: My devil's voice (MLA)
data.detailed_description: The infernal authorities entrusted the Ambitious Demon with a new business - to look after a small town. He is already ready to lead the inhabitants to the most terrible manifestations of the Fall in their lives, but, unfortunately, the heavenly administration also does not sleep and directs her to counterbalance the equally ambitious angel in order to maintain the balance of power. You have to help the demon in the confrontation with the angel and persuade the inhabitants of the city to fall into sin.
data.about_the_game: The infernal authorities entrusted the Ambitious Demon with a new business - to look after a small town. He is already ready to lead the inhabitants to the most terrible manifestations of the Fall in their lives, but, unfortunately, the heavenly administration also does not sleep and directs her to counterbalance the equally ambitious angel in order to maintain the balance of power. You have to help the demon in the confrontation with the angel and persuade the inhabitants of the city to fall into sin.
data.short_description: The infernal authorities entrusted the Ambitious Demon with a new business - to look after a small town. He is already ready to lead the inhabitants to the most terrible manifestations of the Fall in their lives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core2DUO 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
